name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: An introductory course to the fundamentals of Creative Writing, focusing on the basics of narrative structure, poetry, and playwriting.

name: Creative Writing Fundamentals
description: This course focuses on the basics of Creative Writing, including characterization, story structure, and style.

name: Creative Writing Techniques
description: This course focuses on more advanced techniques and methods of Creative Writing, including plot construction, dialogue, and world-building.

name: Satire Writing Basics
description: This course focuses on the fundamentals of Satire Writing, including its historical roots, types of satire, and rhetorical devices.

name: Satire Writing Techniques
description: This course focuses on more advanced techniques of Satire Writing, including satire in different media, satire in literature, and developing satire.
